Section.Catchline: Representing another insurer in same industrial debit territory.

Subsection.Text: No insurer shall employ or appoint to sell weekly premium or industrial insurance in a given debit territory any agent who has within the preceding 6 months sold insurance for another insurer in the same or any part of the same debit territory, unless prior to employment the written approval of the previous insurer is obtained.
This section shall not be construed as preventing such an individual from representing another insurer in a different debit territory.
